item.title: AAP Manifesto 2014
item.description: Manifesto - What does manifesto represent. Manifesto is a public statement of someone’s policies, views and intention do something which political parties put in front of people before elections. Why do Political Parities Need Manifesto - Manifesto functions as both a statement of a principles and a bold, sometimes rebellious call to action. By causing people to evaluate the gap between those principles and their current reality, the manifesto challenges assumptions, fosters commitment, and provokes change.
